name: date-fns-example-typescript
description: Example of date-fns usage with TypeScript
author: Sasha Koss <koss@nocorp.me>

scripts.build: yarn run build-date-fns && yarn run build-typescript && yarn run build-webpack
scripts.build-typescript: tsc --outDir dist example.ts fp.ts misc.ts constants.ts
scripts.build-webpack: webpack example=./dist/example.js fp=./dist/fp misc=./dist/misc.js constants=./dist/constants.js --output-path dist --output-filename [name].bundle.js
scripts.test: yarn run test-example && yarn run test-fp && yarn run test-misc && yarn run test-constants
